title: DJI Goggles
description: Natively compatible with flagship DJI products, DJI Goggles feature two 1920×1080 displays and an OcuSync wireless transmission system that provide amazing FPV flight experiences.[1] Thanks to their optimized touchpad and Head Tracking, control is amazingly easy and intuitive. In addition, users can view panoramas, listen to audio files, and watch video files in various formats.
